section.title: The menu bar
section.para: The menu bar has seven different menu, which we will see next and each menu can do several actions, let's take a look.

itemizedlist.listitem: Wizard : Run the start assistant
Open evidence : Select virtual device to mount
Open device : Select local device to mount
Exit : Exit DFF
Preferences : Configuration of DFF
Load : Load a module
Browse : Browse all modules
Connectors : Mount the item you want analyse
Databases : Allows to analyse items with database structure
Export : Allows to copy or extract data
File systems : Rebuilding and analysing file system
Hash : Calculate and compare file's numeric signature
Mailbox : Analyse mail content with exchange format
Malware : Scan to find malware
Metadata : Extract meta-data from some filetype
Node : Allows to manipulate some nodes
Search : Carving's module
Statistics : Show statistics by filetype or do a timeline
Viewers : Allows to view some filetype
Volatile memory : Analyse the RAM content
Volumes : Alllows to search and mount logical volumes
Maximize : Change the selected tab to fullscreen
Fullscreen mode : Switch DFF interface to fullscreen
Browser : Open a new navigation tab
Console : Show the tab allowing to write command lines
Live scripting : Show python interpretor
Report : Open the tab alowind to edit report, previsualize and export to html format
IDE : Open the Integrated development environment of python module
About DFF : Version information and some link
Documentation : Help of DFF
